text.section: A debtor, any secondary obligor, or any other secured party or lienholder may redeem collateral.

To redeem collateral, a person shall tender:
Fulfillment of all obligations secured by the collateral; and
The reasonable expenses and attorney's fees described in § 9-615(a)(1).

A redemption may occur at any time before a secured party:
Has collected collateral under § 9-607;
Has disposed of collateral or entered into a contract for its disposition under § 9-610; or
Has accepted collateral in full or partial satisfaction of the obligation it secures under § 9-622.
